title: [娱乐]Marriage Reloaded 0.3 —— 高级结婚系统[1.7.2-R1.0]
author: yk19980515
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:08 编辑 

本帖最后由 yk19980515 于 2014-8-9 15:43 编辑

它有什么用？
作为娱乐插件，它的功能是为多人服务器提供结婚功能. 结婚之后，一对伴侣就可以住在一起，互相传送还有更多的特性等待大家发现。

特性
与玩家结婚
传送至家
查看结婚玩家列表
自己和伴侣之间不会造成直接伤害
不同性别之间的玩家显示自定义的登入和登出信息
所有东西都能在配置中自己设置!
与Vault插件和经济插件功能相联通
结婚生子!

Commands
/marry - 查看指令使用
/marry <player> - 发送结婚请求至对方玩家
/marry accept - 接受结婚请求
/marry divorce - 与伴侣离婚
/marry tp - 传送回房子
/marry love - 对伴侣示爱 (代码来自 MarriagePlus)
/marry list - 查看所有结婚的玩家的列表
/marry gift - 把手中的物品作为礼物送给伴侣
/marry sethome - 设置你和你的伴侣的家
/marry home - 传送至你的家
/marry chat - 进入结婚聊天模式 (只和你的伴侣的聊天模式)
/marry heal <amount> - 用你的生命点数治疗你的伴侣
/marry feed <amount> - 用你的饥饿点数喂给你的伴侣
/gender male/female - 设置你的性别
/marry setpriest <player> - 设置为牧师（暂无功能）
/marry <player_1> <player_2> - 使两个玩家结婚 (牧师使用)

配置
双倍经验

如果你和你的伴侣之间不超过十个格子，你和你的伴侣将会得到双倍经验

性别

这个特性将会使你在每次登陆和登出都有不同的消息，女孩将会是粉色，男孩将会是蓝色

金钱

输入 /marry <player> 和 /marry divorce 之后所消耗的金钱

金钱分享

玩家将会和伴侣之间分享金钱

前缀

给结婚的玩家一个前缀

注意，如果安装了 Essentials, 在配置中将OP的颜色设置为: 'none'

权限
marry.*: 将会得到所有权限

marry.list - 可以查看结婚列表
marry.marry - 可以发起结婚请求和接受结婚请求
marry.gift - 允许送出礼物
marry.tp - 允许伴侣间传送
marry.home - 可以传送至自己和伴侣的家
marry.sethome - 可以设置自己的家
marry.gender - 允许设置性别
marry.love - 可以示爱
marry.chat - 允许结婚聊天模式
marry.admin - 管理员权限
marry.feed - 允许分享食物
marry.heal - 允许分享血量

改动日志：

v0.3
made Children included with Marriage
added priests
added option to disable update checker
added new commands
v0.2.10
works with Children v1.1 :D
fixed economy sharing
fixed exceptions on PlayerMove and /marry love
v0.2.9
works with Children v1.0 :D
v0.2.8
made a custom plugin for children
added prefixes
fixed some bugs
v0.2.7
added /child breed
fixed exception on playerInteract
fixed some little bugs
added childs
v0.2.6
fixed money exploit
changed /marry accept <player> to /marry accept
added a message when the console is trieng to marry
changed the main command
fuxed some bugs
v0.2.5
added option to share money
added option to disable /marry tp if you partner is in a different world
fixed join/leave messages
fixed some small bugs
v0.2.4
re-added and fixed genders
added double-exp option
changed some old codes to be a bit better
fixed some bugs
v0.2.3
fully fixed /marry list (fianly!)
added a first-join message for ops
v0.2.2
fixed issue with pvp
made config working with colors
fixed some small bugs/permissions
v0.2.1
added /marry feed <amount>
added /marry heal <amount>
fixed up some small issues
re-added VanishNoPacket :)
v0.2
fully fixed /marry list
removed VanishNoPacket support (temp)
fixed some spelling
fixed up command code
fixed some small bugs
fixed update checker
added general permission node
v0.1.10
made plugin working with VanishNoPacket
fixed typo on /marry list
changed version update notifier a bit
made it so it resets your home after /marry divorce
fixed some small bugs
v0.1.9
added quit and join messages for partner
changed update notifier a bit
updated api for developpers
v0.1.8
hopefully fixed /marry list
added /marry chat
prevent people from using /marry gift in creative
fixed some small bugs
v0.1.7
added /marry love
fixed some typo's
v0.1.6
added optional vault support
added option to let people pay for /marry <player> and /marry divorce
a little fix on /marry list
added permission marry.gender
v0.1.5
added /marry divorce
added option to disable/enable pvp between partners in config
v0.1.4
fixed NullPointerExeption at PlayerDamageByEntityEvent
added genders
v0.1.3
added permissions
added update notifier
v0.1.2
nade it so you cant attack your partner
added /marry sethome and /marry home
fixed NullPointerExeption on /marry accept
v0.1.1
added /marry gift
v0.1
release

汉化版下载地址：http://dl.vmall.com/c059pp5ioz
原版下载地址：http://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/633/170/Marriage.jar
